description:
Current protected zones in Namibian waters.
Source: Government notice no 153 in terms of section 65 of Namibia's Marine Rescources Act  27 of 2000 (summarised by Heidi Currie)
Eastern boundary is high water mark (hwm), western boundary created by buffer around hwm or SAN isobaths (last 130 km of southern part of isobaths was generated by V. De Cauwer through a grid based on SAN and Survey General depth points), northern and southern boundaries were estimated because beacon coordinates mentioned in notice were not found at Survey General
name: Namibia: Marine protected zones
